createRecord.description: Creates a new record into a specified table.

deleteRecord.description: Deletes a record from a table.

downloadFileFromRecord.description: Downloads a file attached to a record.

props.name: searchValue
props.description: The value to search for in the specified field.

listFilesFromRecord.description: List files attached to a specific record (without downloading) for management.

updateRecord.description: Updates fields on an existing record.

uploadFile.description: Attach a file to a record.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload to the record.

newRecord.description: Triggers when a new record is created in a table.
